third_party/closure/goog/loremipsum/text/loremipsum.js

3/**
4 * @fileoverview A generator of lorem ipsum text based on the python
5 * implementation at http://code.google.com/p/lorem-ipsum-generator/.
6 *
7 */
8
9goog.provide('goog.text.LoremIpsum');
10
11goog.require('goog.array');
12goog.require('goog.math');
13goog.require('goog.string');
14goog.require('goog.structs.Map');
15goog.require('goog.structs.Set');
16
17
18
19/**
20 * Generates random strings of "lorem ipsum" text, based on the word
21 * distribution of a sample text, using the words in a dictionary.
22 * @constructor
23 */
24goog.text.LoremIpsum = function() {
25 this.generateChains_(this.sample_);
26 this.generateStatistics_(this.sample_);
27
28 this.initializeDictionary_(this.dictionary_);
29};
30
31
32/**
33 * Delimiters that end sentences.
34 * @type {Array<string>}
35 * @private
36 */
37goog.text.LoremIpsum.DELIMITERS_SENTENCES_ = ['.', '?', '!'];
38
39
40/**
41 * Regular expression for spliting a text into sentences.
42 * @type {RegExp}
43 * @private
44 */
45goog.text.LoremIpsum.SENTENCE_SPLIT_REGEX_ = /[\.\?\!]/;
46
47
48/**
49 * Delimiters that end words.
50 * @type {Array<string>}
51 * @private
52 */
53goog.text.LoremIpsum.DELIMITERS_WORDS_ = [',', '.', '?', '!'];
54
55
56/**
57 * Regular expression for spliting text into words.
58 * @type {RegExp}
59 * @private
60 */
61goog.text.LoremIpsum.WORD_SPLIT_REGEX_ = /\s/;
62
63
64/**
65 * Words that can be used in the generated output.
66 * Maps a word-length to a list of words of that length.
67 * @type {goog.structs.Map}
68 * @private
69 */
70goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.words_;
71
72
73/**
74 * Chains of three words that appear in the sample text
75 * Maps a pair of word-lengths to a third word-length and an optional
76 * piece of trailing punctuation (for example, a period, comma, etc.).
77 * @type {goog.structs.Map}
78 * @private
79 */
80goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.chains_;
81
82
83/**
84 * Pairs of word-lengths that can appear at the beginning of sentences.
85 * @type {Array}
86 */
87goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.starts_;
88
89
90/**
91 * Averange sentence length in words.
92 * @type {number}
93 * @private
94 */
95goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.sentenceMean_;
96
97
98/**
99 * Sigma (sqrt of variance) for the sentence length in words.
100 * @type {number}
101 * @private
102 */
103goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.sentenceSigma_;
104
105
106/**
107 * Averange paragraph length in sentences.
108 * @type {number}
109 * @private
110 */
111goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.paragraphMean_;
112
113
114/**
115 * Sigma (sqrt of variance) for the paragraph length in sentences.
116 * @type {number}
117 * @private
118 */
119goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.paragraphSigma_;
120
121
122/**
123 * Generates the chains and starts values required for sentence generation.
124 * @param {string} sample The same text.
125 * @private
126 */
127goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.generateChains_ = function(sample) {
128 var words = goog.text.LoremIpsum.splitWords_(sample);
129 var wordInfo = goog.array.map(words, goog.text.LoremIpsum.getWordInfo_);
130
131 var previous = [0, 0];
132 var previousKey = previous.join('-');
133 var chains = new goog.structs.Map();
134 var starts = [previousKey];
135 var chainKeys = {};
136
137 goog.array.forEach(wordInfo, function(pair) {
138 var chain = chains.get(previousKey);
139 if (chain) {
140 chain.push(pair);
141 } else {
142 chain = [pair];
143 chains.set(previousKey, chain);
144 }
145
146 if (goog.array.contains(
147 goog.text.LoremIpsum.DELIMITERS_SENTENCES_, pair[1])) {
148 starts.push(previousKey);
149 }
150 chainKeys[previousKey] = previous;
151 previous = [previous[1], pair[0]];
152 previousKey = previous.join('-');
153 });
154
155 if (chains.getCount() > 0) {
156 this.chains_ = chains;
157 this.starts_ = starts;
158 this.chainKeys_ = chainKeys;
159 } else {
160 throw Error('Could not generate chains from sample text.');
161 }
162};
163
164
165/**
166 * Calculates the mean and standard deviation of sentence and paragraph lengths.
167 * @param {string} sample The same text.
168 * @private
169 */
170goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.generateStatistics_ = function(sample) {
171 this.generateSentenceStatistics_(sample);
172 this.generateParagraphStatistics_(sample);
173};
174
175
176/**
177 * Calculates the mean and standard deviation of the lengths of sentences
178 * (in words) in a sample text.
179 * @param {string} sample The same text.
180 * @private
181 */
182goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.generateSentenceStatistics_ = function(sample) {
183 var sentences = goog.array.filter(
184 goog.text.LoremIpsum.splitSentences_(sample),
185 goog.text.LoremIpsum.isNotEmptyOrWhitepace_);
186
187 var sentenceLengths = goog.array.map(
188 goog.array.map(sentences, goog.text.LoremIpsum.splitWords_),
189 goog.text.LoremIpsum.arrayLength_);
190 this.sentenceMean_ = goog.math.average.apply(null, sentenceLengths);
191 this.sentenceSigma_ = goog.math.standardDeviation.apply(
192 null, sentenceLengths);
193};
194
195
196/**
197 * Calculates the mean and standard deviation of the lengths of paragraphs
198 * (in sentences) in a sample text.
199 * @param {string} sample The same text.
200 * @private
201 */
202goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.generateParagraphStatistics_ = function(sample) {
203 var paragraphs = goog.array.filter(
204 goog.text.LoremIpsum.splitParagraphs_(sample),
205 goog.text.LoremIpsum.isNotEmptyOrWhitepace_);
206
207 var paragraphLengths = goog.array.map(
208 goog.array.map(paragraphs, goog.text.LoremIpsum.splitSentences_),
209 goog.text.LoremIpsum.arrayLength_);
210
211 this.paragraphMean_ = goog.math.average.apply(null, paragraphLengths);
212 this.paragraphSigma_ = goog.math.standardDeviation.apply(
213 null, paragraphLengths);
214};
215
216
217/**
218 * Sets the generator to use a given selection of words for generating
219 * sentences with.
220 * @param {string} dictionary The dictionary to use.
221 * @private
222 */
223goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.initializeDictionary_ = function(dictionary) {
224 var dictionaryWords = goog.text.LoremIpsum.splitWords_(dictionary);
225
226 var words = new goog.structs.Map();
227 goog.array.forEach(dictionaryWords, function(word) {
228 var set = words.get(word.length);
229 if (!set) {
230 set = new goog.structs.Set();
231 words.set(word.length, set);
232 }
233 set.add(word);
234 });
235
236 this.words_ = words;
237};
238
239
240/**
241 * Picks a random starting chain.
242 * @return {Array<string>} The starting key.
243 * @private
244 */
245goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.chooseRandomStart_ = function() {
246 var key = goog.text.LoremIpsum.randomChoice_(this.starts_);
247 return this.chainKeys_[key];
248};
249
250
251/**
252 * Generates a single sentence, of random length.
253 * @param {boolean=} opt_startWithLorem Whether to start the setnence with the
254 * standard "Lorem ipsum..." first sentence.
255 * @return {string} The generated sentence.
256 */
257goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.generateSentence = function(opt_startWithLorem) {
258 if (this.chains_.getCount() == 0 || this.starts_.length == 0) {
259 throw Error('No chains created');
260 }
261
262 if (this.words_.getCount() == 0) {
263 throw Error('No dictionary');
264 }
265
266 // The length of the sentence is a normally distributed random variable.
267 var sentenceLength = goog.text.LoremIpsum.randomNormal_(
268 this.sentenceMean_, this.sentenceSigma_);
269 sentenceLength = Math.max(Math.floor(sentenceLength), 1);
270
271 var wordDelimiter = ''; // Defined here in case while loop doesn't run
272
273 // Start the sentence with "Lorem ipsum...", if desired
274 var sentence;
275 if (opt_startWithLorem) {
276 var lorem = 'lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteteur adipiscing elit';
277 sentence = goog.text.LoremIpsum.splitWords_(lorem);
278 if (sentence.length > sentenceLength) {
279 sentence.length = sentenceLength;
280 }
281 var lastWord = sentence[sentence.length - 1];
282 var lastChar = lastWord.substring(lastWord.length - 1);
283 if (goog.array.contains(goog.text.LoremIpsum.DELIMITERS_WORDS_, lastChar)) {
284 wordDelimiter = lastChar;
285 }
286 } else {
287 sentence = [];
288 }
289
290 var previous = [];
291 var previousKey = '';
292 // Generate a sentence from the "chains"
293 while (sentence.length < sentenceLength) {
294 // If the current starting point is invalid, choose another randomly
295 if (!this.chains_.containsKey(previousKey)) {
296 previous = this.chooseRandomStart_();
297 previousKey = previous.join('-');
298 }
299
300 // Choose the next "chain" to go to. This determines the next word
301 // length we'll use, and whether there is e.g. a comma at the end of
302 // the word.
303 var chain = /** @type {Array} */ (goog.text.LoremIpsum.randomChoice_(
304 /** @type {Array} */ (this.chains_.get(previousKey))));
305 var wordLength = chain[0];
306
307 // If the word delimiter contained in the chain is also a sentence
308 // delimiter, then we don't include it because we don't want the
309 // sentence to end prematurely (we want the length to match the
310 // sentence_length value).
311 //debugger;
312 if (goog.array.contains(goog.text.LoremIpsum.DELIMITERS_SENTENCES_,
313 chain[1])) {
314 wordDelimiter = '';
315 } else {
316 wordDelimiter = chain[1];
317 }
318
319 // Choose a word randomly that matches (or closely matches) the
320 // length we're after.
321 var closestLength = goog.text.LoremIpsum.chooseClosest(
322 this.words_.getKeys(), wordLength);
323 var word = goog.text.LoremIpsum.randomChoice_(
324 this.words_.get(closestLength).getValues());
325
326 sentence.push(word + wordDelimiter);
327 previous = [previous[1], wordLength];
328 previousKey = previous.join('-');
329 }
330
331 // Finish the sentence off with capitalisation, a period and
332 // form it into a string
333 sentence = sentence.join(' ');
334 sentence = sentence.slice(0, 1).toUpperCase() + sentence.slice(1);
335 if (sentence.substring(sentence.length - 1) == wordDelimiter) {
336 sentence = sentence.slice(0, sentence.length - 1);
337 }
338 return sentence + '.';
339};
340
341
342/**
343 * Generates a single lorem ipsum paragraph, of random length.
344 * @param {boolean=} opt_startWithLorem Whether to start the sentence with the
345 * standard "Lorem ipsum..." first sentence.
346 * @return {string} The generated sentence.
347 */
348goog.text.LoremIpsum.prototype.generateParagraph = function(
349 opt_startWithLorem) {
350 // The length of the paragraph is a normally distributed random variable.
351 var paragraphLength = goog.text.LoremIpsum.randomNormal_(
352 this.paragraphMean_, this.paragraphSigma_);
353 paragraphLength = Math.max(Math.floor(paragraphLength), 1);
354
355 // Construct a paragraph from a number of sentences.
356 var paragraph = [];
357 var startWithLorem = opt_startWithLorem;
358 while (paragraph.length < paragraphLength) {
359 var sentence = this.generateSentence(startWithLorem);
360 paragraph.push(sentence);
361 startWithLorem = false;
362 }
363
364 // Form the paragraph into a string.
365 paragraph = paragraph.join(' ');
366 return paragraph;
367};
368
369
370/**
371 * Splits a piece of text into paragraphs.
372 * @param {string} text The text to split.
373 * @return {Array<string>} An array of paragraphs.
374 * @private
375 */
376goog.text.LoremIpsum.splitParagraphs_ = function(text) {
377 return text.split('\n');
378};
379
380
381/**
382 * Splits a piece of text into sentences.
383 * @param {string} text The text to split.
384 * @return {Array<string>} An array of sentences.
385 * @private
386 */
387goog.text.LoremIpsum.splitSentences_ = function(text) {
388 return goog.array.filter(
389 text.split(goog.text.LoremIpsum.SENTENCE_SPLIT_REGEX_),
390 goog.text.LoremIpsum.isNotEmptyOrWhitepace_);
391};
392
393
394/**
395 * Splits a piece of text into words..
396 * @param {string} text The text to split.
397 * @return {Array<string>} An array of words.
398 * @private
399 */
400goog.text.LoremIpsum.splitWords_ = function(text) {
401 return goog.array.filter(
402 text.split(goog.text.LoremIpsum.WORD_SPLIT_REGEX_),
403 goog.text.LoremIpsum.isNotEmptyOrWhitepace_);
404};
405
406
407/**
408 * Returns the text is not empty or just whitespace.
409 * @param {string} text The text to check.
410 * @return {boolean} Whether the text is nether empty nor whitespace.
411 * @private
412 */
413goog.text.LoremIpsum.isNotEmptyOrWhitepace_ = function(text) {
414 return goog.string.trim(text).length > 0;
415};
416
417
418/**
419 * Returns the length of an array. Written as a function so it can be used
420 * as a function parameter.
421 * @param {Array} array The array to check.
422 * @return {number} The length of the array.
423 * @private
424 */
425goog.text.LoremIpsum.arrayLength_ = function(array) {
426 return array.length;
427};
428
429
430/**
431 * Find the number in the list of values that is closest to the target.
432 * @param {Array<number>|Array<string>} values The values.
433 * @param {number} target The target value.
434 * @return {number} The closest value.
435 */
436goog.text.LoremIpsum.chooseClosest = function(values, target) {
437 var closest = Number(values[0]);
438 goog.array.forEach(values, function(value) {
439 if (Math.abs(target - value) < Math.abs(target - closest)) {
440 closest = value;
441 }
442 });
443
444 return closest;
445};
446
447
448/**
449 * Gets info about a word used as part of the lorem ipsum algorithm.
450 * @param {string} word The word to check.
451 * @return {Array} A two element array. The first element is the size of the
452 * word. The second element is the delimter used in the word.
453 * @private
454 */
455goog.text.LoremIpsum.getWordInfo_ = function(word) {
456 var ret;
457 goog.array.some(goog.text.LoremIpsum.DELIMITERS_WORDS_,
458 function(delimiter) {
459 if (goog.string.endsWith(word, delimiter)) {
460 ret = [word.length - delimiter.length, delimiter];
461 return true;
462 }
463 return false;
464 }
465 );
466 return ret || [word.length, ''];
467};
468
469
470/**
471 * Constant used for {@link #randomNormal_}.
472 * @type {number}
473 * @private
474 */
475goog.text.LoremIpsum.NV_MAGICCONST_ = 4 * Math.exp(-0.5) / Math.sqrt(2.0);
476
477
478/**
479 * Generates a random number for a normal distribution with the specified
480 * mean and sigma.
481 * @param {number} mu The mean of the distribution.
482 * @param {number} sigma The sigma of the distribution.
483 * @return {number}
484 * @private
485 */
486goog.text.LoremIpsum.randomNormal_ = function(mu, sigma) {
487 while (true) {
488 var u1 = Math.random();
489 var u2 = 1.0 - Math.random();
490 var z = goog.text.LoremIpsum.NV_MAGICCONST_ * (u1 - 0.5) / u2;
491 var zz = z * z / 4.0;
492 if (zz <= -Math.log(u2)) {
493 break;
494 }
495 }
496 return mu + z * sigma;
497};
498
499
500/**
501 * Picks a random element of the array.
502 * @param {Array} array The array to pick from.
503 * @return {*} An element from the array.
504 * @private
505 */
506goog.text.LoremIpsum.randomChoice_ = function(array) {
507 return array[goog.math.randomInt(array.length)];
508};
509
